content: Your task is to carefully determine which answer is more plausible. Each provided answer is a numeric value. You should give your response in the required json format: "{"reasons": "(a string of your reasoning process)", "answer": "(a pure numeric value without unit)"}". You are forbidden to copy others' reasoning steps.

{"reasons": "Based on the given information, Marcy works for the same company for 40 years and gets an annual pension of $50,000/year. Starting after 20 years, she becomes entitled to 5% of the value of the pension per year. If she quits after 30 years, we need to calculate the annual pension she will receive. After 30 years, Marcy will receive 5% of the value of the pension per year. 5% of $50,000 is $2,500. So, her annual pension after 30 years will be $50,000 + $2,500 = $52,500.", "answer": "52500"}
